other_title: 魁!! クロマティ高校 (Japanese)
plot: Folks, meet Takashi Kamiyama. Enrolled at Cromartie High, where everybody is a delinquent, Kamiyama is apparently the only non-delinquent in the school. Logically, therefore, he must be the toughest in his class - by the rather twisted logic that only a really tough rabbit would lie down with lions. Thus begins a story that parodies every cliché of tough-guy anime that you've ever heard of, and some you haven't. Oh, and Freddie Mercury is in it, too.
ending_theme: "Cromartie High School School Song" by Sun Plaza Nakano (eps 19,23)
insert_song: "Ningen Nante" (人間なんて) by Takuro Yoshida
